entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:20 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 10:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow mixed with rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
